name: Kasslan
content:
Kasslan was a female Tarasin, who lived on the planet of Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Kasslan was the Mother of the Vriisan irstat, a Tarasin tribe. The Vriisan were custodians of a cave where Reidi Artom, the discoverer of the Cularin system, had left a number of writings. During the time of the Clone Wars, Kasslan showed the writings to a group of explorers.
Some time afterwards, Kasslan and a number of other Tarasin mothers requested that the Tarasin assist the Cularin Militia in an operation to combat the Wyrd.
